name: emulously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you want to copy or compete with what someone else has done: They were all doing well and were all emulously hoping to do even better. They love their work and emulously apply themselves to it. Related word
emulous
More examplesFewer examplesEach of them in turn emulously recounted their achievements.A bird sang in the clear morning air, and others began to sing emulously, or so it seemed.They would try emulously to outdo one another.They all worked emulously to compose music, each of them boasting about their work.
